data.Description (en): Moonbeam is a fully Ethereum-compatible L1 on Polkadot that mirrors Ethereum’s Web3 RPC, accounts, keys, subscriptions, logs, and more. The Moonbeam platform extends the base Ethereum feature set with additional features such as on-chain governance, staking, and cross-chain integrations.
data.Description (zh): Moonbeam是Polkadot上完全与以太坊兼容的 L1，它有与以太坊一样的Web3 RPC、账户、密钥、订阅、日志等。Moonbeam平台扩展了基本的以太坊功能集，并增加了链上治理、质押和跨链集成等附加功能。
